what: Champagne Glass Volume Calculation and Party Simulation
title: Champagne Glass Volume Calculation and Party Simulation
text: champagneZwick1121 package designed offer efficient solutions calculating volume champagne glasses using various vectorization techniques R. package implements different approaches, including loops, apply functions, direct vectorization, providing users comprehensive comparison performance.

title: Champagne Glass Volume Calculation and Party Simulation
text: can install development version champagneZwick1121 GitHub :

title: Champagne Glass Volume Calculation and Party Simulation
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(champagneZwick1121)  # Example of calculating the volume using a for loop implementation result_for_loop <- f_for_loop(x)  # Vectorized approach result_vectorized <- f_vectorized(x)  # Simulate Party party_simulation <- simulate_party(x)
